title: Rototom Music Festival

what.title: What is Rototom?
what.content: It's the greatest Reggae music festival in Europe, founded in Pordenone (Italy) in 1991. However, since 2010 it has been held in Benicasim (Spain).

goal.title: The main objectives
goal.content: The main goal was to create unforgettable experiences for the attendees, create a safer environment with less chance of fraud, reduce cash losses, go digital with access control and payment transactions on the 2019th edition which led to a sales increase and made fraud virtually impossible.

cta: Ready to have a total control over your event and advanced operational efficiency?
